name: Go Tell the King of Cats
storyline: A difficult tabby cat has made his home in your lodgings. He insists that only you can help him get what he wants – a return to his former glory. He has a long journey in mind, one that will take him across the kingdoms of cats in search of their mythical King.
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for April, 2020. Second entry in the Season of Endeavours.
